name: essentials-claude-code
description: Multi-agent orchestration framework for Claude Code. Three workflows: Simple (plan → implement-loop), Tasks (plan → prd.json → tasks-loop/RalphTUI), Beads (plan → beads → beads-loop/RalphTUI). Each task/bead preserves full implementation code. Implementation loops that iterate until complete.
author: carlonicora

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: 15 commands, 10 agents. Three workflows: Simple, Tasks, Beads. Each task/bead is 100% self-contained (50-200+ lines of code). RalphTUI integration for TUI dashboard. LSP-powered code analysis via Claude Code built-in LSP.
